content: this pattern is beautiful worked in solids and variegated colors this pattern is available excerpted online for free * canadian living knit a ballband dishcloth 1 aussi en français 2 **materials ** * peaches & creme worsted weight by elmore-pisgah increase 1 ball each in color a and color b * size 7 4 5 mm needles 1 http //www canadianliving com/crafts/knitting/knit_a_ballband_dishcloth php 2 http //tricots-crochet blogspot com/2012/12/ballband-dishcloth html
